I am Mengdi Zhang, a proud alumna of the Jacobs School of Medicine and Biomedical Sciences at University at Buffalo, where I earned a B.S. in Biomedical Sciences (2020) and an M.S. in Biomedical Engineering (2022). My Master’s research on Exosomal microRNA delivery, guided by Dr. Yun Wu, laid the foundation for my current role.
As a Research Associate II at Astellas, I’m part of the mRNA Therapy Team in Applied Research and Operations division. My work centers on pioneering platform technologies to revolutionize drug discovery. I have a keen interest in the targeted nanoparticle delivery of nucleic acids, especially with mRNA.
Discover more about my journey and research interests here!
